name: GRAVITY BACKPACK
description:
GRAVITY BACKPACK - The story of a space master. He travels through deep space in search of those in need. On his final journey, he finds a gravity backpack, and his life changes!

Change the gravity field to make your path easier. Avoid traps or simply overcome them using gravity. Travel on a spaceship avoiding enemy projectiles!

The game is a 2D platformer with puzzle elements.

Game Features:
- Pixel graphics
- Various levels
- Good soundtrack
